comment.author: 61271636@N05
comment._content: The portals for both the trains and trams haven't been completed at this point.

comment.author: 86916510@N00
comment._content:
Interesting that they put box girders under the Train/Tram tracks. Overall weight must have been a consideration if they didn't just pour one big concrete slab?
But of course they didn't have pre-stressed concrete then.
